caption.paragraph:
FIGURE 13. a.
Colletes chengtehensis Yasumatsu
, male: Metasomal sternum 7 (dorsal view); b. Metasomal terga 1 and 2; c.
C. marginatus Mocsary
, male: Metasomal sternum 7 (dorsal view); d. Metasomal terga 1 and 2; e.
C. mlokossewiczi Radoszkowski
, male: Metasomal sternum 7 (dorsal view); f. Metasomal terga 1 and 2. Scale bar: 1 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Distribution in Ukraine (
Fig. 3
f).
Kiev Prov., Cherkasy Prov., Kirovohrad Prov., Mykolaiv Prov., Kherson Prov., Crimea, *Kharkiv Prov., Luhansk Prov., Donetsk Prov., Zaporizhia Prov.

General distribution. Portugal , Spain , France , Germany , Switzerland , Austria , Czech Republic , Slovakia , Hungary , Italy , Croatia , Serbia , Romania , Bulgaria , Greece , Turkey , Ukraine , Russia , Georgia , Azerbaijan , Kazakhstan , Kyrgyzstan , Tajikistan , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan .
